heading: HR01066
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES COMMITTEE TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, THE FAILURE OF THE MASBATE ELECTRIC COOPERATIVE TO SETTLE ITS 240 MILLION PESO OBLIGATION WHICH THEREBY RESULTED  IN THE DISCONNECTION OF THE POWER SUPPLY IN THE WHOLE PROVINCE OF MASBATE, FOR THE PURPOSE OF RESOLVING THE POWER SUPPLY PROBLEM IN THE PROVINCE OF MASBATE
status: Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2018-07-30
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01066
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES COMMITTEE TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, THE FAILURE OF THE MASBATE ELECTRIC COOPERATIVE TO SETTLE ITS 240 MILLION PESO OBLIGATION WHICH THEREBY RESULTED IN THE DISCONNECTION OF THE POWER SUPPLY IN THE WHOLE PROVINCE OF MASBATE, FOR THE PURPOSE OF RESOLVING THE POWER SUPPLY PROBLEM IN THE PROVINCE OF MASBATE
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : LANETE, SCOTT DAVIES S. M.D.
DATE FILED : 2017-06-05
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2018-07-30
          -Both MASELCO management and the DMCI were instructed to continuously engage in a dialogue to settle the financial obligation and consider infrastructure augmentation for the electric consumers of Masbate. A meeting will be called after three (3) months to follow up the management and financial situation of MASELCO.
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON ENERGY ON 2017-11-28
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2017-07-25;
